description: This Java class, DocsController, provides an API endpoint (/docs) that redirects clients to the Swagger UI documentation page, maintaining the original request's scheme, host, and port. It helps ensure users are directed correctly to API documentation, especially when behind reverse proxies.

classes.name: DocsController
classes.description: A Spring REST controller that handles redirection to the Swagger UI API documentation page.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Handles GET requests to /docs; constructs a redirect URL to the Swagger UI page while preserving original request scheme, host, and port.
